前.definition: front; forward; ahead; first; top (followed by a number); future; ago; before; BC (e.g. 前293年); former; formerly

前不久.definition: not long ago; not long before

前不巴村，後不巴店.pinyin: qián bù bā cūn ， hòu bù bā diàn
前不巴村，後不巴店.definition: see 前不著村，後不著店|前不着村，后不着店[qian2 bu4 zhao2 cun1 , hou4 bu4 zhao2 dian4]

前不著村，後不著店.pinyin: qián bù zhù cūn ， hòu bù zhù diàn
前不著村，後不著店.definition: lit. no village ahead and no inn behind (idiom); fig. to be stranded in the middle of nowhere; to be in a predicament

前不見古人，後不見來者.pinyin: qián bù jiàn gǔ rén ， hòu bù jiàn lái zhě

前世姻緣.definition: a marriage predestined in a former life (idiom)

前事.definition: past events; antecedent; what has happened

前事不忘，後事之師.pinyin: qián shì bù wàng ， hòu shì zhī shī
前事不忘，後事之師.definition: don't forget past events, they can guide you in future (idiom); benefit from past experience

前人.definition: predecessor; forebears; the person facing you

前人栽樹，後人乘涼.pinyin: qián rén zāi shù ， hòu rén chéng liáng
前人栽樹，後人乘涼.definition: to enjoy the benefits of the hard work of one's predecessors. (idiom)

前仆後繼.definition: one falls, the next follows (idiom); stepping into the breach to replace fallen comrades; advancing wave upon wave

前仰後合.definition: to sway to and fro; to rock back and forth

前俯後仰.definition: to rock one's body backward and forward; to be convulsed (with laughter etc)

前倨後恭.definition: to switch from arrogance to deference (idiom)

前凸後翹.definition: (of a woman) to have nice curves; buxom; shapely

前功盡棄.definition: to waste all one's previous efforts (idiom); all that has been achieved goes down the drain

前半夜.definition: first half of the night (from nightfall to midnight)

前半天.definition: morning; a.m.; first half of the day

前半天兒.definition: erhua variant of 前半天[qian2 ban4 tian1]

前半晌.definition: morning; a.m.; first half of the day

前半晌兒.definition: erhua variant of 前半晌[qian2 ban4 shang3]

前因後果.definition: cause and effects (idiom); entire process of development

前塵.definition: the past; impurity contracted previously (in the sentient world) (Buddhism)

前寒武紀.definition: pre-Cambrian, geological period before c. 540m years ago

前幾天.definition: a few days ago; a few days before; the past few days; the previous few days

前廳.definition: anteroom; vestibule; lobby (of a hotel etc)

前往.definition: to leave for; to proceed towards; to go to

前後.definition: around; from beginning to end; all around; front and rear

前後文.definition: context; the surrounding words; same as 上下文

前怕狼後怕虎.pinyin: qián pà láng hòu pà hǔ
前怕狼後怕虎.definition: lit. to fear the wolf in front and the tiger behind (idiom); fig. to be full of needless fears; reds under the beds

前房角.definition: anterior chamber (the front chamber of the eye)

前揭.definition: (the item) named above; aforementioned; cited above; op. cit.

前方高能.definition: (slang) Something awesome is about to happen! (originally, in a Japanese space battleship anime, it meant "Danger! High energy up ahead!" — a warning to either prepare for battle or take evasive action)

前景可期.definition: to have a promising future; to have bright prospects

前段.definition: front part (of an object); first part (of an event); previous paragraph

前涼.definition: Former Liang, one of the Sixteen Kingdoms (314-376)

前漢.definition: Former Han dynasty (206 BC-8 AD), also called 西漢|西汉[Xi1 Han4], Western Han dynasty

前漢書.definition: History of the Former Han Dynasty, second of the 24 dynastic histories 二十四史[Er4 shi2 si4 Shi3], composed by Ban Gu 班固[Ban1 Gu4] in 82 during Eastern Han (later Han), 100 scrolls

前無古人，後無來者.pinyin: qián wú gǔ rén ， hòu wú lái zhě
前無古人，後無來者.definition: there has never been and never will be another person like this (idiom); never done before and unlikely to be matched in the future; peerless

前燕.definition: Former Yan of the Sixteen Kingdoms (337-370)

前秦.definition: Former Qin of the Sixteen Kingdoms (351-395)

前程遠大.definition: to have a future full of promise

前端.definition: front; front end; forward part of sth

前線.definition: front line; military front; workface; cutting edge

前緣未了.definition: one's predestined fate is yet to be fulfilled (idiom)

前置.definition: to place before; frontal; leading; pre-

前胸貼後背.definition: (lit.) chest sticking to back; (fig.) famished; (of several persons) packed chest to back

前腳.definition: one moment ..., (the next ...); leading foot (in walking)

前臺.definition: stage; proscenium; foreground in politics etc (sometimes derog.); front desk; reception desk; (computing) front-end; foreground

前臼齒.definition: premolar tooth (immediately behind canine teeth in some mammals)

前衛.definition: advanced guard; vanguard; avant-garde; forward (soccer position)

前言.definition: preface; foreword; introduction; preamble; earlier remarks; earlier words; (literary) words of the ancient thinkers

前赴後繼.definition: to advance dauntlessly in wave upon wave (idiom)

前趙.definition: Former Zhao of the Sixteen Kingdoms (304-329)

前身.definition: forerunner; predecessor; precursor; previous incarnation (Buddhism); jacket front

前車之覆，後車之鑒.pinyin: qián chē zhī fù ， hòu chē zhī jiàn
前車之覆，後車之鑒.definition: lit. the cart in front overturns, a warning to the following cart (idiom); fig. draw lesson from the failure of one's predecessor; learn from past mistake; once bitten twice shy

前車之鑑.definition: lit. a warning taken from the overturned cart ahead (idiom); fig. lesson learned by observing others' failures

前車之鑒.definition: variant of 前車之鑑|前车之鉴[qian2che1 zhi1 jian4]

前述.definition: aforestated; stated above; the preceding statement

前途未卜.definition: hanging in the balance; the future is hard to forecast; ¿Qué serà?; who knows what the future holds?

前途渺茫.definition: not knowing what to do next; at a loose end

前進.definition: to go forward; to forge ahead; to advance; onward

前進區.definition: Qianjin district of Kiamusze or Jiamusi city 佳木斯[Jia1 mu4 si1], Heilongjiang

前邊.definition: front; the front side; in front of

前邊兒.definition: erhua variant of 前邊|前边[qian2 bian5]

前郭爾羅斯蒙古族自治縣.pinyin: qián guō ěr luó sī měng gǔ zú zì zhì xiàn
前郭爾羅斯蒙古族自治縣.definition: Qian Gorlos Mongol autonomous county in Songyuan 松原, Jilin

前郭縣.definition: Qian Gorlos Mongol autonomous county in Songyuan 松原, Jilin

前郭鎮.definition: Qian Gorlos township, capital of Qian Gorlos Mongol autonomous county 前郭爾羅斯蒙古族自治縣|前郭尔罗斯蒙古族自治县, Songyuan, Jilin

前金.definition: Qianjin or Chienchin district of Kaohsiung city 高雄市[Gao1 xiong2 shi4], south Taiwan

前金區.definition: Qianjin or Chienchin district of Kaohsiung city 高雄市[Gao1 xiong2 shi4], south Taiwan

前鋸肌.definition: serratus anterior muscle (upper sides of the chest)

前鎮.definition: Qianzhen or Chienchen district of Kaohsiung city 高雄市[Gao1 xiong2 shi4], south Taiwan

前鎮區.definition: Qianzhen or Chienchen district of Kaohsiung city 高雄市[Gao1 xiong2 shi4], south Taiwan

前門.definition: front door; main entrance; honest and upright approach (as opposed to 後門|后门, back-door or under the counter)

前門打虎，後門打狼.pinyin: qián mén dǎ hǔ ， hòu mén dǎ láng
前門打虎，後門打狼.definition: to beat a tiger from the front door, only to have a wolf come in at the back (idiom); fig. facing one problem after another

前門拒虎，後門進狼.pinyin: qián mén jù hǔ ， hòu mén jìn láng
前門拒虎，後門進狼.definition: to beat a tiger from the front door, only to have a wolf come in at the back (idiom); fig. facing one problem after another

前面.definition: ahead; in front; preceding; above; also pr. [qian2 mian5]

前頭.definition: in front; at the head; ahead; above

前鼻音.definition: alveolar nasal; consonant n produced in the nose with the tongue against the alveolar ridge
